snippet.title: New Indie Gameplay Trailer for Flashlight
snippet.description:
Dropping a second trailer highlighting the gameplay improvements made since the first trailer. We've got much more frantic gameplay along with more interesting ways to blow up zombie bits!

Wishlist us on Steam!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1456260/Flashlight/

https://twitter.com/southwatergames
